thread.title: Justin Bieber and Ed Sheeran lead the winners at the MTV EMAs 2015
thread.title_full: Justin Bieber and Ed Sheeran lead the winners at the MTV EMAs 2015

title: Justin Bieber and Ed Sheeran lead the winners at the MTV EMAs 2015
text:
Sunday, Oct 25 2015, 23:08 GMT Share on Facebook Share on Twitter Share on Google+ After taking home a total of five awards from the MTV Europe Music Awards 2015, Justin Bieber was clearly the biggest winner at tonight's (October 25) ceremony.The 21-year-old star won Best Male, Best Worldwide Act: North America, and even beat the likes of One Direction and Taylor Swift to take home the award for Biggest Fans. 
© Anthony Harvey/Getty Images for MTV MTV EMAs 2015: All the night's winners Rounding out his total were the awards for Best Look and Best Collaboration for 'Where Are You Now?' with Skrillex and Diplo.Other winners at the event held in Milan, Italy include One Direction for Best Pop, Nicki Minaj for Best Hip Hop and Taylor Swift ft Kendrick Lamar for Best Song with 'Bad Blood'. 
© Dave Hogan/MTV 2015/Getty Images for MTV Singer and songwriter Ed Sheeran, who hosted the event alongside Orange is the New Black actress Ruby Rose , also took home two awards for Best Live Act and Best World Stage for his performance at 2014's V Festival in Hylands Park.Tonight's MTV EMAs were presented live from the Mediolanum Forum in Milan, and featured performances from winners Sheeran and Bieber, as well as Ellie Goulding, Pharrell Williams, Jason Derulo, Macklemore & Ryan Lewis and Jess Glynne.
